# Welcome to the PQQ Manager Site

This site serves as a dynamic repository for all your Pre-Qualification Questionnaire (PQQ) drafts, your organized evidence library, and a log of processed PQQ source documents.

Use the navigation menu to explore the content.

*   **PQQ Drafts:** Automatically generated responses for incoming PQQ documents.
*   **Evidence Library:** Your categorized knowledge base for quick reference.
*   **Processed Log:** A record of all source PQQ files that have been processed.
*   **Help Guide:** Detailed instructions on how to use the PQQ Manager system.
